name: Trumpo Jumpy Cross The Road Rider Go 2K16
name_original: Trumpo Jumpy Cross The Road Rider Go 2K16
description:
A New Exciting Game as a Harder Challenge to you!
Experiencing how far you can keep!
But,How many level can you go?

[How to play?]

> Tap means the Chicken, Trump, Hillary Up!
> Double Tap to flap the wings to fly.
> Keep away from the pillars (Don't Touch the pillars).

Good Luck For You!
